member.name: F:SDL3.SDL.EventType.Last
member.summary: Last event is used for bounding internal arrays

member.name: M:SDL3.SDL.CreateRenderer(System.IntPtr,System.String)
member.summary: Create a 2D rendering context for a window.
member.param: The window where rendering is displayed.
The name of the rendering driver to initialize, or NULL to let SDL choose one.
member.returns: A valid rendering pointer or 0 on failure.

member.name: M:SDL3.SDL.CreateWindow(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,SDL3.SDL.WindowFlags)
member.summary: Create a window with the specified dimensions and flags.
member.returns: The window pointer that was created or 0 on failure.

members.member: All other missing bindings are related to OpenGL or other these bindings will eventually be added!
